# `get_img_corners`

get_img_corners


## Description

finds four corner spatial coords of giottoImages or magick-images


## Usage

```r
get_img_corners(img_object)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`img_object`     |     giottoImage or magick-image to use
